creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Woman with orange-red hair wearing hair ornament against lightly patterned background; her upper body is wrapped in a green cape and patterned dress with high collar; gilded gold frame
inscription:
At LL in type: [ ORIGINAL LITHOGRAPHIE IN ACHT FARBEN VON H. DE 
TOULOUISE LAUTREC,  PAN I ]
provenance: [Hubert Gallery, New York, until 2002; sold, November 23, to Dayton]; Bruce B. and Ruth Dayton, Wayzata, Minn. (2002-2010; given to MIA)
title: Mademoiselle Marcelle Lender, en buste
